backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, transactions, notifications, and authorization‑protected methods for saving profiles, creating transactions, and fetching notifications.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, related components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining a warm color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps pages in AuthGate for authenticated access.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Global layout with header, footer, navigation bar, and logout handling for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication wrapper that blocks content until Internet Identity login is completed.
frontend/src/components/CameraErrorState: Displays camera-related error messages with icons and a retry button, choosing content based on error type.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and saving a user’s display name and phone number using Internet Identity and a save-profile mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, state management, and stored identity loading via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Hooks to fetch user notifications and send or mark notifications as read using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hooks for retrieving and saving caller or other users’ profiles through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Defines a mutation for creating transactions and invalidates notification queries after success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing navigation cards, unread notifications, and triggering profile setup if missing.
frontend/src/pages/MyQRPage.tsx: Displays the user's QR code using a custom canvas generator, loading profile data and rendering fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows user notifications with read/unread states and allows marking notifications as read.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Fetches and displays the user's profile details including name, phone, and QR code.
frontend/src/pages/ReceiptPage.tsx: Displays a mock payment receipt based on a transaction ID and provides navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ScanPayPage.tsx: Scans a QR code, fetches recipient info, and submits a payment with optional notes.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Shows the user's transaction history, currently using placeholder empty-state logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL params (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from storage or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending typography, colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with added plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing versions, requirements, features, architectural notes, issues, and image assets for a payments app.
